name: ProjectM : Daydream
description: Experience a daydream like never before in VR. Experience skydiving, hang out at the beach, or just chat with a digital friend in the comfort of a virtual kitchen.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: 64-bit Windows 7 Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350, or equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX970 / AMD R9 290 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
